generic.description: Not recommended for users younger than 3 years of age

description.el: Μπερδευτείτε περισσότερο για να κερδίσετε τους φίλους σας στο Entanglement.
description.zh-TW: 只要比好友在連線上打更多結，即可在 Entanglement 中取得遊戲勝利。
description.vi: Tải nhiều bảng chơi phức tạp hơn bạn bè để giành chiến thắng trong trò chơi Entanglement.
description.ca: Embolica't més que els teus amics per guanyar a Entanglement.
description.it: Ingarbugliati più dei tuoi amici per vincere la partita di Entanglement.
description.cs: Soutěžte s přáteli ve hře Entanglement – vyhrává ten, kdo se více zašmodrchá.
description.sv-SE: I Entanglement vinner du om du trasslar in dig mer än dina vänner.
description.id: Rebut simpul lebih banyak daripada teman-teman untuk memenangkan permainan Entanglement.
description.es: Para ganar la partida de Entanglement, tu recorrido debe ser más intrincado que el de tus amigos.
description.ru: Чтобы одержать победу, запутайтесь сильнее, чем ваши друзья.
description.nl: Raak minder snel in de knoop dan je vrienden en win de game Entanglement.
description.tr: Entanglement oyununu kazanmak için arkadaşlarınızın yaptığından daha dolaşık yollar oluşturun.
description.en-US:
Create the longest path possible and challenge your friends in the game of Entanglement.
Entanglement is a puzzle game made for you by Gopherwood Studios. Try to make the longest path possible. Rotate and place hexagonal tiles etched with paths to extend your path without running into a wall. This web game includes:

Solitaire - In this single-player mode, you try to beat your own record or compete against others on our daily, weekly, and all-time leaderboards.

Multiplayer - Play against up to 5 other people on the same computer in this hot-seat variation. This mode offers a chance to challenge your friends head-to-head: try to grab the longest paths without running into each other or the wall.

---

Love Entanglement and want more? Try the Expansion Sampler! Explore an engaging new game mode with a wild twist, two stylish maps, and a daily challenge to see who is the best at Entanglement!

Sakura Grove - A completely new game-play mode for Entanglement! You have a spacious garden surrounded by cherry trees, but you have a limited number of tiles to play. Acquire more tiles by directing your path through one of the cherry trees, which blooms every time you pass through it.

Hana Blossom - A new flower-shaped map for Entanglement with the original rules. The map is larger but the petals provide an interesting challenge; it’s easy to get into one, but make sure to plan your way out, or your game will end quickly! This is a wonderful challenge for advanced Entanglement players.

Lotus Petal - A new tiny map for Entanglement also using the original rules. It is a great training ground to practice your ability to string together long paths and plan future moves. You can also play the map quickly enough to have a nice slice of Entanglement fun in the time of a commercial break.

Daily Challenge - A new challenge every day for Entanglement players! All players are given the exact same set of tiles for the entire day, competing on strategy alone for the daily championship!

This expansion is available for Entanglement enthusiasts for $1.99 via Google Checkout or PayPal.
description.ro: Implicaţi-vă mai mult decât prietenii şi câştigaţi jocul Entanglement.
description.pl: Zaplącz się bardziej od znajomych, aby wygrać w Entanglement.
description.fr: Soyez plus tordu que vos amis pour gagner à Entanglement.
description.bg: Бъдете по-преплетени от приятелите си, за да спечелите Entanglement.
description.de: Treten Sie gegen Ihre Freunde an und lösen Sie ein kniffliges Waben-Puzzle!
description.da: Bliv mere sammenfiltret end dine venner, og vind spillet Entanglement.
description.pt-BR:
Classificação ESRB: E para todos 

Crie um caminho mais confuso do que seus amigos para vencer no Entanglement.
description.fi: Muodosta kavereitasi mutkikkaampi polku ja päihitä heidät Entanglement-pelissä.
description.hu: Az Entanglement játék megnyeréséhez készíts bonyolultabb útvesztőt, mint ismerőseid.
description.ja: たくさんクネクネした方の勝ち、それが Entanglement です。
description.pt-PT: Envolva-se mais que os seus amigos para vencer o jogo Entanglement.
description.sr: Упетљајте се више од пријатеља да бисте победили у игри Entanglement.
description.ko: 친구보다 더 얽어서 Entanglement 게임에서 이겨보세요.
description.sk: Prebuďte v sebe dôvtip a prekonajte priateľov v hre Entanglement.
description.zh-CN: 和您的朋友比试一下“六边拼图”，看谁连的路线更长。
description.uk: Заплутайте сліди краще за друзів, щоб перемогти в грі Entanglement.
description.sl: Sestavite daljšo pot kot vaši prijatelji in zmagajte v igri Entanglement.

release_notes.en-US: Removed in-app payment flows for Google Checkout and PayPal from app store page.
